byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Cairo.

abstract: Twenty-five Egyptian prisoners are set free in exchange for the freedom of Ilan Grapel, American-Israeli dual citizen who was charged with spying in Egypt.
snippet: Twenty-five Egyptian prisoners were set free in exchange for the freedom of Ilan Grapel, an American-Israeli dual citizen who was charged with spying in Egypt.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-five Egyptian prisoners were set free in exchange for the freedom of Ilan Grapel, an American-Israeli dual citizen who was charged with spying in Egypt.

headline.main: American-Israeli Held in Egypt Is Released
headline.print_headline: American-Israeli Held in Egypt Is Released
headline.seo: Ilan Grapel, an American-Israeli Held by Egypt, Is Released in Prisoner Exchange
